synopsis.text: Tami and Yaya, Naru's childhood friends, have found their passions in life, but Naru, a typical 14-year-old girl, remains unremarkable in every aspect. With a deep admiration for fairy tale heroines, she yearns for a life as captivating as theirs. One fateful night, she encounters Hana, an American transfer student, dancing exuberantly beneath the moonlight. Mistaking Hana for a fairy, Naru's life takes an unexpected turn as she is introduced to the enchanting world of yosakoi dancing. Despite her initial apprehension, Naru finds herself captivated by the dance and decides to join Hana in starting a yosakoi club at their school. Embarking on this journey, Naru discovers the magic she's been longing for in the rhythm and movement of yosakoi, transforming her ordinary life into an extraordinary adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
